#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define pb push_back
typedef long long ll;
using namespace std;


int main(){
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
    cin.tie(NULL);

    int N;cin>>N;
    string s;
    map<char,string> up,low;
    up['0'] = "00";up['1'] = "00";up['2']= "00";up['3']= "00";
    up['4'] = "01";up['5'] = "01";up['6']= "01";up['7']= "01";
    up['8'] = "10";up['9']= "10";up['A']= "10";up['B']= "10";
    up['C'] = "11";up['D']= "11";up['E']= "11";up['F']= "11";

    low['0'] = "00";low['1'] = "01";low['2']= "10";low['3']= "11";
    low['4'] = "00";low['5'] = "01";low['6']= "10";low['7']= "11";
    low['8'] = "00";low['9']= "01";low['A']= "10";low['B']= "11";
    low['C'] = "00";low['D']= "01";low['E']= "10";low['F']= "11";

    cin>>s;
    string n1,n2,sol="";
    for(int i=0;i<s.size();i++){n1+=up[s[i]];n2+=low[s[i]];}

    //cout<<n1<<endl<<n2<<endl;
    int carry=0;
    for(int i=n1.size()-1;i>=0;i--){
        int b= n1[i]-'0';
        int a= n2[i]-'0';

        if(a && b){
            if(carry){sol+='1';}
            else {sol+='0';carry=1;}
        }else if(a || b){
            if(carry){sol+='0';carry=1;}
            else {sol+='1';}
        }else{
            if(carry){sol+='1';carry=0;}
            else {sol+='0';}
        }

        //cout<<"a: "<<a<<" b: "<<b<<" c: "<<carry<<endl;
    }
    for(int i=sol.size()-1;i>=0;i--)cout<<sol[i];
    cout<<endl;
}
